shadow.name: CORRUPTION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Cauldron, expressing through corruption

gift.name: EQUILIBRIUM
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Cauldron, expressing through equilibrium

siddhi.name: HARMONY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Cauldron, expressing through harmony

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 50 shadow frequency. The corruption you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural equilibrium. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from corruption to equilibrium.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of corruption.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 50 consciously for 7 days, the corruption pattern will shift toward equilibrium.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 50 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from corruption toward equilibrium
